title: How is Vedantu online coaching helpful for JEE preparation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Today every new person is starting his/her own coaching because they know it is cheap and can guarantee good ROI. Vedantu is one such company, you should not fall for these non-reputed websites, they would give anything but good material. You should take trial classes of any video lecture available online before making any decision. After all, it is a decision that can completely change your life. You cannot just go ahead with anything blindly. However, about Vedantu, I would like to describe an incident that happened to me at the beginning of class 11th. I attended one of the so-called educational webinars of Vedantu called mastering chemical equations and reaction- their reaction mechanisms. However, their main concern was Organic Chemistry according to them. This was supposed to be for class 11th. For about 45 minutes these teachers kept beating around the bush, finally, he talked about the topic, which students of class 9th have already study. They talked about Types of Chemical Reaction and their Balancing of the chemical equations(hit and trial method not the Ion Electron Method). WTF, such a webinar for class Class 11th students. Claps. What do they think- they can teach an already known board topic to any JEE Aspirant? Finally, he advertised vendatu and asked the people to tell the students how great he was. Never attend these stupid people. I say never. Now coming on their video lectures and tutoring. One of my cousins(now in IIT Guwahati Chemical), who used Vedantu told me that it was not very fruitful. Throughout your preparation, you have to suffer an exhaustive training. Most of the times you would be having many doubts and need a quick answer to it which you will receive at Vedantu. Many times it happened with me that my doubts were not answered for 2 to 3 days. These were his words. Come on man what you think the tutors are, they are just unqualified JEE Teachers who are still in Private Colleges and are in the need of money. At least 50 to 100 or more than that is given for each doubt solving. Even if you solve 10 per day you get a good income per month. Nobody checks man. Even in my college such kind of freelancing is done. It very good for college students- less time to make a huge amount of money. My senior(now at IIT KGP MnC) had taken a subscription of Ahaguru Video Lectures. Though I didn’t use Ahaguru, but my senior has a very positive review of it. In his words: ”I have a very good review of it. I am completely satisfied with their services. I loved to attend Balaji’s sir Physics and Maths classes. The way in which he taught made the concepts crystal clear. Also, they had provided me with a mentor who used to weekly call me and solve my doubts. Also, I used to call him whenever I wished and he used to solve my doubts. This is a unique feature of Ahahguru. It is a one-time investment of 22k/annum at Ahaguru for all the three subjects but it is worth investing. You will be definitely happy with their service if you apply your own efforts also.” At last, it is you who has to make the choice. Good Luck for your JEE Journey ahead!!

I have seen Vedantu YouTube channel when they have very less no. of subscribers and there journey to big company as well. Well I am currently pursuing B.tech at NIT Allahabad and in my preparation days I have not taken any courses form Vedantu + not from any other coaching as well. At that time Vedantu have not got such fame, but after that they got some investments and started there advertisements. So, what are the factors which you look upto when you purchase any online courses from any coaching. You should research about teachers who will teach you in that particular subjects. You should know some background about your teachers.Price of that course should justify the content provided in that course + material given.In courses what all things are included.Whether they give you test series or not.Will they regularly mentor you in distance learning program.Will they take extra classes for doubts.Check these all things when you are taking online coaching from anyone. Well I will suggest you one online coaching which I got to know from my friends or seniors in my college - Its Ahaguru Online Coaching - By Dr. Balaji Sampath ( AIR 4 in IIT JEE ) Our college opener of last year is from Ahaguru ( he is our senior and I got to know about this coaching from him & I was amazed that some one can get this much rank only from online coaching) from that onwards I really recommend everyone who asked me to a lower rate + amazing coaching + regularly mentorship from Toppers.  Other students who are creating wonders after studying from Ahaguru. You will get mentored by top rank holders + they will also teach you so it's obvious that you will create wonders in examination. So, according to me if you are finding a good online coaching + material + test series + regular mentoring all in one best possible price then you should consider Ahaguru ( also search about it's founder on google Dr. Balaji Sampath AIR 4 in IIT JEE ). “Cheers” Hope you will find best possible courses at good price there. Regards Sanket Tiwari | NIT Allahabad

Vedantu’s cofounders were the teachers for the top AIR’s including AIR 1 in JEE ADVANCED and are teaching at vedantu. Vedantu has integrity ..integrity means to keep up the promise . Prices are reasonable . For entire 11 and 12 syllabus revision + JEE Mains and advanced training with tests which were taken by the top AIRs ,which helped in assessing who will actually be the real topper,they just charged around 9000 rupees wheras in other coaching institutes it will be more than double this rate!Vedantu has the best of teachers from all over the world whom we can choose as per our study requirement and time and we ,sitting in any part of the world can listen to the class . Vedantu provides a free session with the teacher before we decide to learn from them and if we dont like we can always choose another good teacherin vedantu. Vedantu gives free solutions to RD Sharma , HC verma ,NCERT and many other papers Vedantu team is working really hard to help every student to reach beyond their potential. We also get our doubts cleared from teachers and students through whatsapp or during sessions. They make sure we send our feedback and ensure that the quality of teaching and website care team is always good . The cofounders who are teaching us are the most wonderful persons ..they teach us with lot of dedication and affection and integrity. Lastly vedantu is better than byjus(good collection of questions but do not keep promise of 24 hour doubt clearing ..teachers in byjus do not help with doubts at all it is very rare and difficult)and simple lecture (good doubt clearing forum but the study material vedios are only average) and meritnation(good doubt clearing forum and sample papers to solve but live classes are not much beneficial)..but vedantu is the best because we get all doubts cleared and we can choose a teacher personally to clear all our doubts in vedantu..teachers teach and clear doubts ..teachers also provide homework questions and tests . Also as vedantu is an online platform for learning we save travel time and can learn comfortably at home. Thanks a lot to the vedantu team

Let's quote some facts here to answer this question. Founders of Vedantu are 4 IITians who themselves have taught thousands of students in both offline as well as online format !Before starting Vedantu, they had started an offline institute by the name of LAKSHYA, a leading JEE coaching institute in North India and Mumbai !Vedantu founders have trained and mentored many faculties who have taught in various institutions including the famous ones like ALLEN, Resonance, Bansal, FIITJEE, AAKASHPresently the teachers taking JEE batches on Vedantu are vastly experienced in both offline as well as online format.Vedantu not only provides good teachers but also focuses hard on quality content for solving, balanced tests for evaluating, and doubt forums and doubt sessions for exhaustive discussion !With vast experience and knowledge about scores of students who have cleared JEE MAIN and ADVANCED, Team Vedantu has exhaustive data points that enables them to identify the potential rank of kids and necessary improvement steps to get the desired rank.Now all this at the convenience of place, time and energy ! Answering this question, is Vedantu good for JEE ! Yes, it potentially has everything that you will look for in any coaching institute ! So it all depends upon on child's comfort with the concept of studying online ! If concept of studying online clicks for a child, Vedantu can be a very good platform ! Last, let's not forget, self study and hard work put in by students matter the most and rest everything comes second to it! So Vedantu for JEE will be good for every hard working student who likes the concept of studying online !

Ah, coaching institutes again. Better and may be even good for preparation of JEE, but not at all suggested for on point preparation and best learning techniques. In this age of technology and devices, there is always a better way and a solution for students like you who can depend on for excellent results. Coaching and learning from books have gotten old and these are ways which won’t save you on your time, money and cost and you may not get much success either. How about an app which takes care of your topic wise preparation, provides video lectures, study materials, practice assessments and even counselling services for students. You are at the right place as you can take the help or assist from “M Learning India”. The best source and place for preparing for everything relating to entrance exams. You can watch their lectures on their youtube channel, visit their website or use their official app for everything relating to entrance exams including preparation to counselling. Their video lectures are pre-recorded, high quality videos relevant to aspirants like you with the best quality course content which is second to none. Focusing and paying attention to building your concepts comes first and is of utmost importance in preparing for these kind of exams. Also due to the added advantage of being taught by the renowned faculty clears away all your doubts and you will also be able to receive and give positive feedback. In these modern times, going to a coaching class or Kota may sure seem to be a good option, but as they say if u plan on working smartly and efficiently, you would have better chances. There is no reason to be concerned about the preparation for JEE once you start using this app as you can stream those video lectures anywhere, anytime and you can get real quality, coaching experience at your convenience and schedule.Further unlimited access to the video lectures and doubt clearing sessions will also help you grow in your preparation and give you the required confidence boost in cracking the exam. Counselling for academic and non-academic purposes, performance centered approach, support centered around student’s needs are more of the wonderful features of this app. Download their app by searching for “M Learning India” on playstore or you can visit their website by searching for the same on Google. All the best !!

I will tell you about Vedantu’s online teaching methods and few points associated with them. NOTE: Purely based on my understanding and observations. Vedantu has teachers which are called “Master Teachers”. This institute, settled in Bengaluru, is not well known at the present time. But the teachers are quite friendly and cooperative. They will teach you by maintaining a very good environment, that would also include humour etc. To be honest, I don’t find their teaching methodology nice. In their videos, I have always observed that they teach in a quite elementary way, especially in chemistry and mathematics.In physics, they teach you the concepts well, but most of the illustrations they take, are actually not expected to appear in actual exam, as per the seen paper pattern.I also find the pace of teaching slow, which can definitely make serious aspirants feel irritated.However, they provide good mock tests. I have attempted few of them and found the level of questions considerable.These observations are made by me and I agree that many people would be having different opinions, which I appreciate.

Vedantu is a very great platform for the preparation of JEE. I myself studied at Vedantu for JEE 2022. I have got one of the best teacher of Vedantu and the country. They have unlimited access to micro courses and doubts. The teachers at vedantu are followed:- Maths:-Arvind Kalia(God &HOD,Best mathematics teacher of the world), Pulkit Jain,Aditya Bhardwaj (ex-HOD Vibrant Jaipur and ex-most senior faculty after HOD's at vibrant academy kota),Arvind Suthar,Rishi Singla,Surendar Jain,Neha Agarwal,Amit Kumar Singh, Shimon Joseph,Shubham Jhanwar, Akash Nair,Shivam Gupta,etc.Chemistry:- Pahul Gulati (Best),Aman Thakur, Saurav Goswami, Abhinav Srivastava,Vikas Nagar,Rimjhim Barkakati,Sudhanshu Jaitly,Subhang Garodia,Hemin Roy,harsh maheshwari, luv mehan,Tarun Sharma, Arvind Arora, Abhishek Gupta, Praveen Jha, Govind Manglani, Sudarshan Premkumar,etc.Physics:-Vamsi Krishna,Anand Prakash, Abhishek Sharma, Ameer basith,Gaurav Gupta, Hemant Sharma, Gaurang Shah, Shreyas Hebbre,Suresh Mahawar,Vikas Agarwal, Prateek Garg,Hemant Sharma,Shivish Kumar,Rolly Mishra,etc.They have a very good test series,Study material and Assignments. Note:- This is totally based upon my experience and I am not endorsing anyone. Thanks for upvoting my answer. Jai Shri Ram. Jai Shri Krishna. Om Namah Shivaay. Jai Hind.

“There are no right or wrong choices, You have to work hard to make your choice correct.” We always ask a question that whether buying ******** course from ********* coaching institute is good or bad, it is only our hard work which decides this, not the person’s achievements or anything, at the best, he can only guide us on the correct path. If you work hard, even the worst of resources can do wonders and vice versa. Here I will tell you some of the good points of Vedantu:- The classes are fun, you would always be eager for your classesAll the teachers are amazing and past IITians and NITians, if not, they are good at making you understand things.The tests are provided with solutions and detailed analysis with the difficulty of the questions, time spent, solution and accuracy rate.The classes are well scheduled and the teachers are dedicated.Everything is available at the ease of your home.Less but quality time is spent on Vedantu, so that you can have a lot of self-study time and can go to school too if you like.Hope you like my answer, if yes, then don’t forget to share and upvote my answer. Upvote and Share !!!

As a student of Vedantu ( Currently in 12th and preparing for JEE ADV 2020). I believe that vedantu is the best you can get for jee. being an online coaching it has a lot of advantages ; You need not waste any time in travelling.You can access the classes from anywhere ( no matter where you live and how small your town is).Since JEE is now computer based so you get used to the CBT mode ( computer based test ).The teachers are legit the best i mean the best ( literally no joke…)The best part compared to offline institutes it demands for a much lesser fees ( approx. 1/3 rd )So I would highly recommend Vedantu ( And yeah just for clarification I m not being sponsored by vedantu to say this .) LIKING MY CONTENT ……… THEN FOLLOW ME ON QUORA !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Vedantu is a teacher hub from where you can select the teacher you want. You would be having two options ie one is private tution(quite expensive) and other is the class course(cheap) now talking about the teaching its quite good in iitjee class course as i have taken many sample classes. They also provide you with test series and all other stuff. But it just lacks in one thing ie making pressure on students to do the homework which is much more important than class. Also you may sometimes find yourself playing games on mobile during a boring class(personal experience) There is no one to keep a watch on you and thats the major issue And ya dont join the private tutions as teachers charge high in it and you may need to wait days to get assignments. Rest teaching is good if you can do everything without anyone keeping a watch on you Thank you Nanak Singh Khurana

Vedantu is the best platform for gaining knowledge. It is the excellent platform i have seen till date. I have enrolled with Toppr, Allen DLP, and with a well reputed institution too but my experience with Vedantu was excellent. It has the best faculty for JEE, NEET, KVPY,etc. and has produced many single digit AIR in JEE Advanced(Sarvesh Mehtani AIR 1, 2017), NEET, AIIMS. I myself think that very soon online platform will become the main medium for studying. As it saves time(approximately 1 hour jouney time from home to tution and vice-versa.) and and keeps you safer as nowadays anything can happen with you especially in case of girls. If you are a JEE, NEET, KYPY, NTSE ,etc. aspirant you should give a try at Vedantu, You will love it.

Vedantu is an awesome platform to learn at your convenience. I joined their Crash Course for JEE Mains and loved it so much. All teachers are from IIT’s with long teaching experiences and excellent teaching skills. Teaching- 5/5 stars Technology Platform- 5/5 stars Content Quality- 5/5 stars They have produced AIR 1, 5, 6, 7… In all and all, I suggest you to join Vedantu’s courses for JEE/NEET.

Well, answering to this I would say it's better to go for offline coaching and probably join a renowned coaching institute. I attended IIT JEE prepaparation coaching at Brother's Academy Ranchi and it was great experience. I had also joined cedantu for some extra knowledge and doubt clearing, but it was not very fruitful. Throughout the 2or 3 years of your preparation, you have to go through an exhaustive training. You need be in regular contact with your teachers, complete your assignments l and many a times require a great amount of motivation which can't be achieved with Vedantu or any other online tutorials. Most of the times you would be having much of doubts and need a quick answer to it which you will not get at Vedantu. Many times it happened with me that my doubts were not answered for 2 to 3 days. So, I don't prefer vedantu

Today every new person is starting his/her own eduventure because they know it is cheap and can gurantee good ROI. Vedantu is one such company, you should not fall for these non-reputed websites, they would give anything but good material. It is better if you go for some reputed DLP if you want or a classroom program, you can always come at Unacademy too!

The Vedantu study material is quite amateurish. Most of the content is substandard. Compared to the other exceptional sources, Vedantu is very incompetent. For online JEE preparation you should instead utilise the superb content from the following sources: IIT Joint Entrance Exam Preparation IIT JEE | Test prep | Khan Academy I wish you get all the success in JEE. Cheers.

upvoters.user_id: Vishnu Varthan A ( விஷ்ணு வர்தன் அ )

response.answer_text: Disclaimer: I work at Vedantu :) I see some students have answered this question in detail. I cannot hope to provide more insights than somebody who has actually taken the crash course. That being said, I would definitely add that Vedantu’s crash course has been designed and delivered by some of the best IIT-JEE teachers of the country. The likes of Pulkit Jain and Anand Prakash who were mentors to this year’s AIR 1 Sarvesh Mehtani and have guided thousands of students during their 10+ years in the education field.

Yes definitely!!!!!!!!!!! I am very thankful for vedantu team , the way they are helping students… There is clear cut information given by pulkit sir in 40 days of every chapter After that there is 15 days spirit course daily 1 hour physics ,chemistry, maths explaining last year questions.. They are taking mock test regularly They clear doubts in group

In my opinion ,it not worth. Check Gradeup or ETOSS .Etoss may be expensive but they good because they are recorded in real classroom of kota. You can also found etoss lecture from students who are selling at low price. If you need test series of MYPAT (ultimate version), then comment down below you will save a lot of money because I know organisation who will provide it

yes definetely teachers are amazing and they teach in very nice there is no doubt on anything. there is academic counceller for a particular batch whom you can talk whatsapp anytime. you can talk to any teacher through whatsapp… Nice platform to learn from home.

I APPRECIATE HARDWORK OF VEDANTU, BUT FOR JEE VEDANTU IS NOT WORTH IT ( NOT CRITICIZING) EVEN THOUGH I DIDNT PURCHASE IT..FEW REASONS AM NOT RECOMMENDING ARE:- IN CLASS 11, I PURCHASE KAYSONS (ONLINE LEARNING PLAT FORM) IT IS NOT MUCH WORTH IT. I MEAN IF YOU UTILIZE THAT MONEY IN BUYING BOOKS AND STUDYING SINCERELY IT WOULD HELP YOU.
The vedantu crash course for the IIT JEE is designed in very easy manner so each and every one can go through it very easily the expert teachers make it more easy to compleat

Vedantu is certainly one of the best channels coming up JEE material …… But if you want a regular coaching style teaching in a regulated manner (online), go for unacademy plus courses…..(even vedantu teachers are there) All the best…

Yes Vedantu is quite helpful for JEE preparation. Their teaching methods is student friendly and also the teachers are nice. I've attended some webinars of Vedantu and I found them useful. All the best!
Its not too good you can take Aakash itutor or you can join regular classes in Aakash institute

No go for unacademy you will never regret that. For 10 percent instant discount use this code 'PLUSU27VN'. I have been using unacademy for more than 4 months now. There are top Kota teachers teaching with Sachin Rana sir (YouTube) DC PANDEY sir himself teaches there. I don't have to type more just go and buy unacademy there are way better teachers there than vedantu. Cheers!
